hadiths.text: Abdullah b. Umar reported:Allah's Messenger (may peace he upon him) singled out one day forbidding us to take vows and said: It would not avert anything; it is by which something is extracted from the miserly person

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ النَّذْرِ، وَأَنَّهُ، لاَ يَرُدُّ شَيْئًا
chapter.eng-name: he Prohibition Of Vows, And Confirmation That They Do Not Avert Anything
